document_data.name: Council of Cities
document_data.mainbody: The '''Council of Cities''' was the ruling body of government in [[Thindol]] since the [[War of Unmasking]] in the {{YearlinkName|605}}.
document_data.Activities: The Council vigilantly guarded Thindol's borders from [[yuan-ti]] interlopers, unaware that agents of [[House Sseradess]] were hiding beneath their noses in the waters of the [[Thingulph]] at the very heart of Thindol.
